front.title: BGP Usage for 5G Edge Computing Service Metadata

abstract.t: This draft describes the problems in the 5G Edge computing environment and how BGP can be used to propagate additional IP layer detectable information about the 5G edge data centers so that the ingress routers in the 5G Local Data Network can make path selections based on not only the routing distance but also the IP Layer relevant metrics of the destinations. The goal is to improve latency and performance for 5G Edge Computing (EC) services even when the detailed servers running status are unavailable.
